answers.answer: Going to keep a log then talk to my ob

How high is your blood sugar?Fasting is ideally in the 70 - 95 range (ideally in the 80s).Maximum post eating should be < 140, but better < 120.Prior to eating should ideally be back to fasting, but < 95.If your sugars are higher than these recommend you talk to your Ob earlier than later.A walk after each meal, and cutting carbs / sweets may also help with lowering blood sugar.

I was diagnosed with GD around 20 days ago and since then I am managing well with diet, sometimes it goes up like around 133-138 , wanted to know if that is fine cuz it is rare, also I do walk 20 mins in the morning n evening too....

question: Any one have blood sugar problems at 20 weeks
